text: "Love Is the Drug" is a 1975 song by English rock band Roxy Music. It is the leading single from their fifth studio album Siren. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 3 in Canada, number 30 in the United States, number 18 in Australia, number 24 in New Zealand, number 9 in the Netherlands and number 15 in Belgium. It was covered by Jamaican singer Grace Jones in 1980. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Roxy Music songs Category:Grace Jones songs Category:Progressive pop songs Category:Funk songs Category:Glam rock songs
